pageTitle: January 18-20: Participate in Hands-On Science Activities | Marian Koshland Science Museum
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {55799=© Copyright 2015 National Academy of Sciences. All rights reserved. (202) 334-1201 ksm@nas.edu 525 E Street NW, Washington, DC 20001, 46072=  Spend the long weekend at the Koshland Science Museum! Participate in hands-on science activities to find out how can small changes make a difference for your health and the environment.   Compare the amounts of sugar in some of your favorite beverages. How does the average amount of sugar consumed per day compare to recommended amounts? Then, plan a healthy meal in the Life Lab gallery.   See how switching to LED light bulbs can reduce the amount of energy used in your home. Identify other ways to mitigate the impacts of climate change in the Earth Lab gallery.   The museum is open Saturday, January 18—Monday, January 20, from 10 a.m. to 6 p.m. }
